name: Charity-thermometer
author: Eyouth { rob.panes }

sections.installation:
1. Upload charitydonation-thermometer folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
sections.changelog:
1.1.2

  • Added options to hide/unhide the Text Options…

1.1.1

  • Added fix on for IE 9, current total position.

1.1

  • Added shortcode attribute for positioning.
  • Add flush_rewrite_rules to fix 404 page not found in updating permalinks.

1.0

  • Initial plugin version

short_description: A plugin for Wordpress charity fund raiser, an html5 canvas thermometer. The html5-canvas and JS is a credit to Ray Hammond who implements the canvas very well. I totally recode the script to make it usable to this plugin.

upgrade_notice.1.1.2: • Added options to hide/unhide the Text Options...
upgrade_notice.1.1: • Fix 404 page not found in changing permalinks.

screenshots.caption: This is the screenshot for the admin of the charity-thermometer plugin.

This one is generated shortcode in creating the charity-thermometer. Remember that the plugin will also generate a post of the created plugin, so you have a choice in embedding this to a page on a sidebar or you can have a link on the actual post.
